price: 107. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey ee samaha fala waxay leeyihiin beeraha Al-Firdaws27 degitaan (marti qaad) ahaan.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسِ نُزُلًا
footnotes: 27. Al-Firdaws waa halka ugu sarreysa uguna fiican Jannada.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti kānat lahum jannātu al-fir'dawsi nuzulan
